thread.title: Gary Chen

author: Gary Chen
title: Gary Chen
text:
After working from regular job, I come home and sit in front of TV or go online doodling. With kid Saturday school monrning time waiting in the parking lot playing online game, my eye sight has deteriate so fast.
Driving Lyft as the front seat help me get away from these bad habits. The best thing becoming Lyft perk are meeting new propke, hearing differnt things, learning various subjects, and mentoring young kids. I am so happy to be part of this group.
